resources.string: Bacaan Izhar Syafawi ialah dengan cara MENZAHIRKAN atau MENJELASKAN sebutan Mim Sakinah apabila bertemu dengan 26 huruf selain م dan ب , dengan merapatkan bibir dan menahan suara dari naik ke pangkal hidung bagi mengelakkan keluarnya suara dengung. Bagi memastikan tiada dengung pada sebutan mim, maka bibir hendaklah dibuka semula dengan cepat setelah ia dirapatkan.

Izhar Shafawi means to pronounce the letters that follow meem sakin with no Ghunna and this rule applies to all Arabic letters except Ba and meem. 

It is called Shafawi because the meem is produced by applying lips tightly above each other. 

Remember the letter Fa and waw are close to the meem in their articulation point, so be careful to recite both two letters separately and clearly when they follow meem sakinah.

For example: “أزكى لكم وأطهر”، “ولهم فيها
QuranVision is an AI-powered mobile application that helps users improve their Quranic recitation by providing real-time feedback on tajweed rules using image detection technology.
Our mission is to make Quranic learning accessible to everyone through innovative technology.
This app was developed by a passionate team dedicated to leveraging AI for educational and spiritual growth.
